name: Metal Panic
description:
Years after the war is over you become a self sustainable Hover Drone, scavenging barren and dangerous lands for resources in order to keep the remaining population of Europe alive.

Team

Project Manager: Khutso Nkadimeng

Designer: Ben van den Heever

Programmer: Alex Carvalho

Writer and QA: Dirk De Felice

Artists: Andiswa Ndaba and Kebafilwe Kotsedi
